section6.text1: Buy new or aged Amazon Seller account
section6.text3: Aged seller accounts are checked by account health, sales history, suspensions, type of fulfillment used to sell, feedback quantity and quality, all performance notifications and ungated brands or categories. As we are having a dropshipping business on Amazon, we know everything about suspensions and importance to check all this information before selling any of the accounts.
section6.text5: New seller accounts that were not suspended upon registration and are almost guaranteed to have no utility bill request in future. We never experienced Amazon asking for a utility bill in case it wasn't requested in the beginning. These accounts can be used both for selling or for technical purposes.

section8.text3: Check the account of your choice via TeamViewer or Any Desk. You inspect the account from your end to confirm your selection.
section8.text6: We take a payment using your preferred method. We accept: Payoneer, bank transfer and bitcoin.
section8.text8: We give you all the log in details to your new account. After that, you set up your own password and Two-Step authentication methods for your Amazon account and Virtual Proxy Server where your account is located.
section8.text10: We help you set up the details like your deposit/change method, business address and legal entity on your Amazon account.

section9.text2: It will take you less than sixty seconds. A member of our team will contact you shortly after.

section10.text2: I have to say, amazmarkets gets over an A+ rating from me. I will be recommending this company and team to everyone. Thanks again!
section10.text4: Excellent and professional service. Very friendly and helpful. Would definitely use again. Highly recommend!

header.text1: Sell your Amazon account with us. Use our online evaluation tool to determine how much your account could be worth
header.text2: Our professional team will support you with the sales and transfer of your Amazon account.

section1.text3: Simply answer the question using our online form.
section1.text4: We get to know each other
section1.text5: One of our friendly sales managers will contact you to request additional information and will also answer all your questions.
section1.text7: After reviewing all the information you have submitted and taking your opinion into account we suggest a fair and honest price for your account.

section3.text1: A step by step explanation of the transfer and sales process
section3.text2: Submit calculator and appoint a call
section3.text3: Find out the cost of your account and book a call to consult with our manager.
section3.text4: Receive an email with screen sharing details
section3.text5: You will receive call details and your manager’s name.
section3.text7: Our team member will make a screen sharing session with you to check your account statistics.
section3.text8: It’s time to sign a bill of sale
section3.text9: We use e-signature for a bill of sale.
section3.text11: You will receive money for your account in 2-3 business days. You will get the confirmation.
section3.text12: Transferring your account to a new owner
section3.text13: Schedule a time for a final screen sharing session. We will help you to fill in details for your account transfer.

section3.text1: Invoices for Amazon from a US supplier with a call
section3.text2: You will receive complete documents in English ready to send out.

section4.text2: This is an officially registered US wholesale supplier: The whole process will take place within the US law and complying with all Amazon requirements.
section4.text3: You receive invoices with all the instructions in 1-2 days after ordering. The supplier can also answer Amazon call on invoices.

section5.text2: If you receive an invoice request, then you can do more than just unlocking your account.

section6.text1: Invoice is requested to verify your account or in connection with some violations.
section6.text2: If you want permission to add a listing to your inventory.
section6.text3: If you want to have access to a certain category.

section7.text1: If you want to have access to a certain category.
section7.text2: In 90% of cases, Amazon call suppliers on invoices. If the company doesn’t manage to contact the supplier, then you will receive an email that Amazon was “unable to verify the supplier”.
